channel.title: No-IP Help!
channel.description:
I have had this premade server, (edited a little) for the some time now, and I still can't figure out the problem! :mad: It is really annoying because everyone just says create a host and then log on with the DNS. I have portforwarded, created my host, download No-IP DUC, turned it on, done everything I could possibly think of and still nothing. "Error Connecting To Server", is all I see every damn time. I can post some pics of my portforward stats and No-IP if it helps, or you can show me some kind of explained tutorial for it. Here are some pics Port Forwarding: [URL=http://img529.imageshack.us/my.php?image=serverfwdingln3.png][IMG]http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/4403/serverfwdingln3.th.png[/img][/URL]
No-IP DUC [URL=http://img340.imageshack.us/my.php?image=serverrortm2hk8.jpg][IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/458/serverrortm2hk8.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Its a good server i just made it say AdamScape, lol but whatever heres a few pics [URL=http://img153.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ps1uv5.png][IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/1337/ps1uv5.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img444.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ps2eg7.png][IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/1374/ps2eg7.th.png[/img][/URL]
Soo.. yeah please help mee out!
